title: Todamont
author: Todamont
content: Looking for the 2013 BitcoinNerd "genesis block" 1g silver round commemorative tokens from this 2014 thread: [SOLD OUT] 1g Silver Round "The Genesis Block" by BitcoinNerd - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=258630.0Willing to buy or trade. Please post here or PM me if you have any and willing to do a deal! Thanks~

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: would also be interested in one of these if someone has multiples to offload.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: Todamont on June 02, 2022, 08:14:27 AMLooking for the 2013 BitcoinNerd "genesis block" 1g silver round commemorative tokens from this 2014 thread: [SOLD OUT] 1g Silver Round "The Genesis Block" by BitcoinNerd - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=258630.0Willing to buy or trade. Please post here or PM me if you have any and willing to do a deal! Thanks~I've got a couple of my 1g coins left, which were also created by DobZombie (same maker as the coin sought above).  I see these coins selling for enormous markups on eBay, so they've become a bit of a sought after item.  Anyway, good luck with getting your coins and if you haven't already, try reaching out to DobZombie as he does pop his head back in here every couple of years to see how the community is going.   [WTS] NastyFans 1g .999 Fine Silver Collector's Rounds (2013) - 0.001 BTChttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=273629.0[WTS] NastyPool 1g .999 Fine Silver Collector's Rounds (2014) - 0.001 BTChttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=728063.0(I know you already know this Todamont, but posted here for others who might be interested.)

comments.author: Todamont
comments.body: I definitely recommend picking up the NastyPool coins. I also have some "10k Bitcoin Pizza" coins from BitcoinNerd. I would consider the four coins to be a "set"... OGNasty are the only ones you can still purchase right now for anything resembling a rational price.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Got me a set of 3the bitcoin pizza one, the bitcoin nerd one and one that seems to be an error coin - its bitcoin pizza on one side and nasty mining on the other side.

comments.author: Todamont
comments.body: OGNasty has claimed the coin with "10k Bitcoin Pizza" on one side and "NastyPool" on the other side is a counterfeit, which is pretty interesting, whether it's true or false. I tried looking up Amagi metals, who I believe minted these coins, to ask about it, but they seem to be a defunct company these days.
